description.narrative: The development objective of the project is to improve the effectiveness of service delivery by Karnataka Gram Panchayats (village governments) particularly with respect to the management of public resources and the delivery of relevant services that the rural people prioritize.

condition.narrative: Legal covenant on eligibility criteria for GPs to receive annual block grants has not been complied with.

title.narrative: Rising satisfaction of village residents with service delivery by gram panchayats.

comment.narrative: Empirical Impact Evaluation Study has been completed. Some key results indicated in the report are;(a) Raising satisfaction withregard to local infrastructure created (b) Quality of assets is relatively better in project villages (c) Discussions with GPmembers express satisfaction in assets such as; roads, street lights and drainages created

title.narrative: Increased block grants to poor Panchayats equal to IDA disbursements based on formula

comment.narrative: GoK statutory grant is now Rs 10 lakh per GP having below 8000 population and Rs 12 lakh per GP having above 8000 population. IDAblock grant release: 2012-13: Rs 60.15 crore2013-14: 5.29 crore

title.narrative: GP revenues, expenditurex and procurement decisions publicly disclosed

comment.narrative: Out of 1341 Gram Panchayats of the project area, 1273 GPs have regular disclosure practice information.2006-07 - 12772007-08 -13272008-09 - 13262009-10 - 13152010-11 - 1086

title.narrative: Rising number of Gram or Ward Sabhas with agendas relevant to improving service delivery.

actual.value: For the year 2011-12: 7515 Sabhas and 1073193 Participants. For the Year 2012-13: 5539 sabhas 554151 participants (25 Taluks) .Sabhas have been conducted in all 1341 GPs, but reports from 14 Taluks are awaited.

comment.narrative: Gram and Ward sabhas held: 2006-07 : 43052007-08 : 47092008-09 : 56022009-10 : 56642010-11 : 72742011-12: 75152012-13:3963(25 Taluks) Grama sabhas in all 1341 GP’s have completed. Reports from 14 Taluks is awaited.

title.narrative: Total amount of revenues generated from own sources by all village governments in the project area.

comment.narrative: 2006-7: Rs. 24.72 crore, 31% collection rate 2007-8: Rs 29.63 crore, 34% collection rate 2008-9: Rs 26.54 crore, 34% collectionrate 2009-10: Rs 29.07 crore, 31% collection rate.2010-11: Rs.36.34 crore, 30% collection rate.2011-12: Rs. 43.60 crore, 30.81%2012-13: 58.09 crore, 38.15% collection rate. (39 Taluks) Reports.

title.narrative: GPs that have implemented the new Financial Management and Accounting System

comment.narrative: BRS and Yearend process for the year 2010-11 & 2011-12 is completed in all 1341 GPs.Out of 1341 project GP’s, 1299 GP’s havecompleted BRS and 1274 GP’s have completed Yearend Process for the year 2012-13.
